title: How to Get Shiny Pokemon & PokeRadar Guide in Pokemon Brilliant Diamond & Shining Pearl
author: Austin John Plays
description:
Pokemon Brilliant Diamond & Shining Pearl has many different ways to get shiny pokemon, including legendary shiny pokemon, shiny starters, and the returning Pokeradar Shiny Odds! here is How to Get Shiny Pokemon & PokeRadar Guide in Pokemon Brilliant Diamond & Shining Pearl
